amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that regulatory information already required to be provided remains obtainable under the Freedom of Information Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-454 to make clear that regulatory information already required to be provided remains FOIAable under current law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 0 (Roll no. 185).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 0 (Roll no. 185).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rogers (MI).
